readable.title: 2998504949_1022fec53b
readable.content: A man in a blue coat walks a small white animal as a buss passes in the background . A man in a blue jacket holding a small white animal on a leash A man in a blue jacket walks a small , white animal while a London Sightseeing bus drives behind him . A man is on a sidewalk with a small animal on a leash . An old man walking a ferrett through the street on a leash .
